reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major infectious pregnancy complications: GBS colonization (100,000-300,000), UTI (50,000-100,000), chorioamnionitis (5,000-20,000), CMV (4,000-8,000), toxoplasmosis (1,000-5,000), syphilis (5,000-20,000), listeriosis/rubella (100-1,000). Conservative estimate ~25,000 per 100k focusing on clinically significant infections. Heterogeneous conditions with wide geographic variation in prevalence and screening practices.
